helpPageTitle.message: ColorLens: Your Web, Accessible and Personalized

helpPageSubtitle.message: Understand the mission of ColorLens and learn how to optimize your browsing experience.

whatIsColorLensBody.message: ColorLens is a browser extension focused on digital accessibility for individuals with color blindness and other difficulties in chromatic distinction. Our goal is to transform the browsing experience, allowing you to personalize and optimize the contrast and colors of any web page, ensuring greater comfort, clarity, and visual precision.

feature1Body.message: Real-time application of color matrix filters over all web pages. Includes essential filters for the most common types of color blindness and their anomalies. This feature uses visual correction algorithms to optimize color perception with a single click.

feature2Body.message: Innovative solution based on presets and manual adjustment. Allows the user to remap specific colors on a website using customizable RGB values. Ideal for graphics and UI elements that depend on color codes, offering total control over the interface.

feature3Body.message: Essential tools for users with low vision and for better readability. Allows global adjustment of contrast and saturation to reduce visual fatigue and ensure text meets accessibility standards.

step2Body.message: Optionally, select a Base Filter for an initial correction.

step3Body.message: Use the Contrast and Saturation sliders.

step4Body.message: Define your replacement rules to achieve exact chromatic distinction.

step5Body.message: Use the demonstration images at the top of the page to visualize the effect of your settings.

step6Body.message: Give the profile a name and click 'Save Profile'.

teamBody.message: ColorLens is an academic initiative developed by Software Engineering students from the University of Pernambuco (UPE), committed to the research and implementation of assistive web technologies. Our goal is to provide tools that enhance visual accessibility and contribute to a more inclusive digital experience.
